name: Bread
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night. All you want is bread. The only thing standing between you and the supermarket is a swarm of paparazzi, desperate to get a picture of you in your pj’s. The longer you avoid them, the more persistent they will become!

Try to make it to the supermarket undetected to avoid losing your fame and all of your wealth along with it. As long as you make it with $3 to buy your bread it will all be worth it.
